comment by the user "Raey" on the Ex-H comment section on this: Judging from the Author's Tweet, I think he was referring to the chimneys of a powerplant. There were THREE chimneys each time he visits her, and there were no huge building near the pwoer plant (see all the images when the background has that Powerplant). In the last panel, The "Power Plant" had FOUR chimneys, and there were those mid-sized buildings near it when there were none each tim ehe visits her. So either 1. He went to the wrong place (he said he didnt really remember where he went each night) or 2. He went to the wrong side of the place (maybe he usually went there from the north, and he went from the south) So Karasu is fine because the MC is stupid. Like the author said, "This is not a tragedy story." EDIT: Notice how there were also never any smokes frmo the Chimneys whenever he visits Karasu, then there were smokes from the "shimneys" on the last panel. So the answer is 1, he simply went to the wrong place.
